Blackstorm:

"Thanks for the suggestion, Kitkat"rpleid the femme "I hope we can 
end our duel later..."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
wrote:
> KitKat::
> 
> She glared and growled at Maxima. Not was not the time and place 
to 
> fight over hurt pride. She looked to Blackstorm.  "Learn well the 
> lessons learned. Oh, and yes, we may be on the same side. We may 
have 
> the same purpose and goal as Predacons. But, as true to your 
> programming, pick your friends carefully. Keep your friends close 
but 
> keep your enimies closer."  She turned and walked out, but not 
before 
> glaring at Maxima. This one would be a problem. For one, she 
assumed 
> a command without reguard for the purpose of others. For one to be 
an 
> effective leaer, one had to use the strong points of all below 
them 
> to thier advantage. This one however, was more selfcentered. She 
> would not live long enough to be of consiquence to her. She walked 
to 
> the entrance of the base and transformed into wolf mode. 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > In a message dated 4/24/03 1:17:01 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> > raccoon7679@y... writes:
> > 
> > 
> > > With lightening fast reflexes, she turned, jumped the ring 
roped 
> in 
> > > one leap, and ran towards Maxima. "YOU! You do not raise your 
> voice 
> > > to me young one. I do not care who you think you are. You will 
> show 
> > > the proper respect. I am the trainer here. You are the 
> interloper. If 
> > > you want to play games, then leave and do your programming 
> > > elsewhere." she said, growling. Her optics red with fury, and 
the 
> fur 
> > > on the back of her neck standing up. "You will learn your 
place 
> young 
> > > one. In the pack, there is an order. And in that order, I am 
your 
> > > supior officer."  She took a step back to recompose herself. 
> > > 
> > > In a more steady and lightly softer tone. "You, young one are 
> clever, 
> > > smart and well knowledged. But you have yet to really learn 
how 
> to 
> > > use this talent to it's fullest potential. When you have, then 
> you 
> > > shall be leader. Untill then, I am still higher ranked. You 
will 
> show 
> > > the rank respect if not the bot. Much like Hydras. He has my 
> loyalty 
> > > and respect. And I shall show that to all who are around me. 
You 
> will 
> > > do well to do the same."
> > > 
> > > She turned and went back to the ring. Her arm still holding 
her 
> > > stomach.
> > > 
> > > 
> > 
> > Maxima's optics glowed. But she would not scrap the bot who just 
> seriously 
> > insulted her. "It is you who have crossed the line. Hydras 
deserves 
> my 
> > loyalty for many reasons. YOU however," her voice still eriely 
calm 
> but 
> > obviously there was hint that she did not appreciate what KitKat 
> just did, 
> > "underestimate me. I am by NO means young. I would be surprized 
> that you 
> > would be older than I. Rodimus himself is much younger than I. 
> #2... 
> > Perceptor has placed ME in charge of Blackstorm. I do believe 
that 
> you have 
> > over stepped your bounds. If I am correct, I don't recall Hydras 
> giving you a 
> > superior ranking let alone charge. Flicker has charge of this 
> place. As does 
> > Perceptor. Now... if you will so kindly step aside & allow me 
> finish 
> > Blackstorm's programming." Her crimson optics glared at Kitkat. 
She 
> knew at 
> > the beginning that this one would be a problem. She was right. 
So 
> many 
> > wanting so much. Sounded far too familiar. Sounded much like 
> Starscream.
